Title: Ganapa
Writer: Chinmay (lyricist), Jayanth Kaikini (lyricist), V. Nagendra Prasad (lyricist), Hrudaya Shiva (lyricist), Prabhu Srinivas (dialogue), Prabhu Srinivas (screenplay), Prabhu Srinivas (story)
Actors: Santhosh Balaraj, Priyanka, Tarun, Master Kalyan
Plot: Ganapa is based on an incident in Bengaluru's underworld. The film takes a realistic approach, not on rowdyism, but on people affected by it.
